jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek is the fastest growing startup in South East Asia. Having started off as a ride hailing company, it rapidly added food delivery, payment, logistics and lifestyle services on the back of 2 million+ drivers and 300,000+ merchants. 

OpsPlatform is responsible for a suite of platforms and services that power Gojek’s driver, merchant, and customer operations. At its core, OpsPlatform bridges the gap between the “offline world” and “online Gojek”. Our products span the gamut of the Gojek universe - driver and fleet onboarding; in-vehicle monetization to increase driver earnings; driver care operations in city walk-in centers; customer care and KYC workflows for drivers, merchants and customers; and sales technology products to empower the food and payment sales teams. The overarching company theme that we’ve made our own is this - Eliminate human bottlenecks and increase productivity 10X. 

Some of the problems our engineers are working on - complex ticket arbitration workflows that auto-resolve driver and customer tickets within seconds, ML-based ticket issue prediction systems, GoAgent app for assisted driver on-boarding and product sales, KYC integrations with government agencies, facial recognition systems to combat fraud, and OCR-powered tech to bring efficiencies to driver and merchant onboarding workflows. Our product tech stack includes Ruby on Rails, GoLang, Clojure, React, Android (100% Kotlin), iOS (100% Swift).

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Design and develop highly scalable, reliable and fault tolerant systems for one of the world’s fastest growing unicorns. 
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment (OpsPlatform teams are in Bangalore, Jakarta and Singapore).
  • Building and managing automated build/test/deployment environments.
  • Coordinate with cross functional teams (Mobile, DevOps, Data, UX, QA, etc.) on building and managing fully automated build/test/deployment environments. Learn new languages and methodologies to constantly hone your craft. 
  • Automate the grunge work so you are free to work on what matters most.

• At-least 2 year of hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying large scale applications in any language or stack.
  • A commitment to writing understandable, maintainable, and reusable software.
  • Data modeling experience in Relational and NoSQL databases.
  • Hands-on experience with any OOP and/or functional programming languages Java, Golang, Clojure, Ruby on Rails, etc.
  • Ability to design and implement low latency RESTful services.
  • Ability to understand and implement CICD. 
  • Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes is a plus!
  • Experience troubleshooting server performance - memory issues, GC tuning, resource leaks, etc.
  • Excellent understanding of interactive application development paradigm, memory management, performance/resource optimizations, database interactions, network programming, concurrency and multithreading, fault tolerance, monitoring, security and operability of systems.
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD, scrum, sprints.
  • Ability to plan, prioritise, estimate and execute releases with a good degree of predictability.
  • Ability to scope, review and refine user stories for technical completeness and to alleviate dependency risks.
  • Proficiency in any one SCM - git, mercurial etc. 
  • Proactive, Accountable, Fast.
  • Prior experience in being a founder is a huge plus. 
  • TDD is a bonus!
